headline: VST Stock Underperforms Industry in the Past 6 Months: How to Play?
summary: Vistra's shares lag the industry after a Moss Landing setback, but rising data-center demand and bold acquisitions could reshape the outlook.

headline: Morgan Stanley Lowers Vistra (VST) Target While Staying Bullish on Long-Term Outlook
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is included among the 13 Most Promising Long-Term Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On February 20, Morgan Stanley analyst David Arcaro lowered the price recommendation on Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) to $215 from $227. He maintained an Overweight rating on the shares. The analyst said the firm is updating its price […]

headline: Nvidia, Lowe's Earnings, Inflation Data: Still to Come This Week
summary: Investors await quarterly earnings from Nvidia, a bellwether for the broader artificial-intelligence trade. They will also eye consumer-confidence data and earnings from home-improvement retailer Lowe’s.

headline: Jim Cramer's top 10 things to watch in the stock market Wednesday
summary: Workday's light guidance is sending the stock down big, and HP Inc. showed just how painful the memory-chip crisis is.
